title: SOLD: 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Charles Comiskey HOF RC (SGC 10)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Charles Comiskey HOF RC (SGC 10)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very rare 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Charles Comiskey HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 10 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
BUMP due to final price reduction.
